title: Sync Creatives Async Response - Failed
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for sync_creatives when status is 'failed'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that the sync operation failed completely and no creatives were processed.

creative_ids.description: Array of creative IDs that failed to sync. Required for identifying which creatives were affected by the operation failure.

errors.description: Array of error objects explaining why the sync operation failed

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.
